00042   MipSelect::MipSelect() 
00043     : Processor("MipSelect")
00044 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00045     ,_histGroupKey(type()),
00046       _histHitPosKey("HitMap"),
00047       _moduleLocationChange(this,&MipSelect::moduleLocationChanged),
00048       _lastLayer(0)
00049 #endif
00050 
00051   {
00052     _description = "Select mips and histogram the signal" ;
00053 
00054     _nHits.push_back(3);
00055     _nHits.push_back(50);
00056     registerProcessorParameter( "NHits" , 
00057                                "The minimum and the maximum number of hits per track for accepted tracks." ,
00058                                _nHits ,
00059                                _nHits);
00060 
00061 
00062     _maxDist=1.;
00063     registerProcessorParameter( "MaxDist" , 
00064                                "The maximum allowed distance in x, y and z of hits of grouped to the same cluster." ,
00065                                _maxDist ,
00066                                _maxDist);
00067 
00068     _clusterEnergy.push_back(1.);
00069     _clusterEnergy.push_back(30*150);
00070     registerProcessorParameter( "ClusterEnergy" , 
00071                                "Minimum and maximum total energy of accepted clusters." ,
00072                                _clusterEnergy ,
00073                                _clusterEnergy);
00074 
00075     _maxChi2=1000.;
00076     registerProcessorParameter( "MaxChi2" , 
00077                                "Maximum chi^2/n.d.f. of line fits to the x and y coordinates." ,
00078                                _maxChi2 ,
00079                                _maxChi2);
00080 
00081 
00082     _w0=4.8;
00083     registerProcessorParameter( "WeightCutOff" , 
00084                                "Cut parameter which defines the energy threshold of hits considered in the centre-of-gravity determination." ,
00085                                _w0 ,
00086                                _w0);
00087 
00088 
00089     _posError.clear();
00090     _posError.push_back(1.5);
00091     _posError.push_back(1.5);
00092     _posError.push_back(.5);
00093     registerProcessorParameter( "ClusterPositionError" , 
00094                                "The error on the cluster position." ,
00095                                 _posError ,
00096                                 _posError,
00097                                 _posError.size());
00098 
00099 
00100     //    _nNeighboursMax=3;
00101     //    registerProcessorParameter( "NNeighboursMax" , 
00102     //                         "The maximum allowed number of neighbour hits per track." ,
00103     //                         _nNeighboursMax,
00104     //                         _nNeighboursMax);
00105 
00106     //    _neighbourDist=2.;
00107     //    registerProcessorParameter( "NeighbourDist" , 
00108     //                         "The distance in x+y of the same layer in which hits are considered to be neighbours" ,
00109     //                         _neighbourDist ,
00110     //                          _neighbourDist);
00111 
00112     registerProcessorParameter( "HitCollectionName" , 
00113                                 "Name of the Calorimeter hit collection"  ,
00114                                 _colName ,
00115                                 std::string("calorimeterHits") ) ;
00116 
00117     registerProcessorParameter( "ClusterCollectionName" , 
00118                                 "Name of the Cluster collection"  ,
00119                                 _clusterColName ,
00120                                 std::string("EcalClusters") ) ;
00121 
00122 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00123     // ------------ parameters of some control histograms
00124     registerProcessorParameter( "HistogramGroupName" , 
00125                                 "The name of the histogram group under which the control histograms will be registered."  ,
00126                                 _histGroupKey.nameStorage(),
00127                                 _histGroupKey.name() );
00128 
00129     _signalHistPar.clear();
00130     _signalHistPar.push_back(200);
00131     _signalHistPar.push_back(0);
00132     _signalHistPar.push_back(3000);
00133     
00134     registerOptionalParameter( "SignalBinning" , 
00135                                "The binning for the control histograms of the signal distribution." ,
00136                                _signalHistPar ,
00137                                _signalHistPar ,
00138                                _signalHistPar.size() ) ;
00139 
00140     _posHistPar.clear();
00141     _posHistPar.push_back(400);
00142     _posHistPar.push_back(-150);
00143     _posHistPar.push_back(150);
00144     
00145     registerOptionalParameter( "PositionBinning" , 
00146                                "The binning of the histograms of the cluster barycentre." ,
00147                                _posHistPar ,
00148                                _posHistPar ,
00149                                _posHistPar.size() ) ;
00150 
00151 
00152     _indexHistPar.clear();
00153     _indexHistPar.push_back(19);
00154     _indexHistPar.push_back(-.5);
00155     _indexHistPar.push_back(19-.5);
00156     _indexHistPar.push_back(19);
00157     _indexHistPar.push_back(-.5);
00158     _indexHistPar.push_back(19-.5);
00159     
00160     registerProcessorParameter( "CellIndexBinning" , 
00161                                 "The binning of the hit histograms." ,
00162                                 _indexHistPar ,
00163                                 _indexHistPar ,
00164                                 _indexHistPar.size() ) ;
00165 
00166 
00167     registerProcessorParameter( "ModuleLocationCollectionName" , 
00168                                 "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the description of the module location (Needed to adapt array sizes)."  ,
00169                                 _colNameModuleLocation ,
00170                                 std::string("ModuleLocation") ) ;
00171 
00172 #endif

00176   void MipSelect::init() {
00177     printParameters();
00178 
00179 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00180     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_moduleLocationChange ,_colNameModuleLocation)) {
00181       std::stringstream message;
00182       message << "MipSelect::init> no conditions data handler for the collection:" << _colNameModuleLocation << ".";
00183       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00184     }
00185 
00186     assert ( _nHits.size() == 2 );
00187     assert ( _clusterEnergy.size() == 2 );
00188 
00189     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00190 
00191     _histCol[kH1NHits]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterNHits"),2,
00192                                                        HistPar(50,-.5,50-.5));
00193     _histCol[kH1ClusterSignal]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterSignal"),1,
00194                                                         HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(_signalHistPar[0]), _signalHistPar[1], _signalHistPar[2]));
00195     _histCol[kH1SignalVsLayer]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterTotalSignalPerLayer"),1,
00196                                                                HistPar(_lastLayer+1, -.5, _lastLayer+.5),true);
00197     _histCol[kH1HitX]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterHitX"),_lastLayer+1,
00198                                                       HistPar(static_cast<unsigned int>(_indexHistPar[0]),_indexHistPar[1],_indexHistPar[2]),true);
00199     _histCol[kH1HitY]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterHitY"),_lastLayer+1,
00200                                                       HistPar(static_cast<unsigned int>(_indexHistPar[3]),_indexHistPar[4],_indexHistPar[5]),true);
00201     _histCol[kH1Mean]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterBaryCentre"),3,
00202                                                         HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(_posHistPar[0]), _posHistPar[1], _posHistPar[2]));
00203     _histCol[kH1RMS]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterRMS"),3,
00204                                                      HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(_posHistPar[0]), _posHistPar[1], _posHistPar[2]));
00205     _histCol[kH1Angle]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterAngle"),2,
00206                                                        HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(500), -50, +50));
00207     _histCol[kH1Chi2]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("LineFitChi2"),2,
00208                                                        HistPar(100,0.,20.));
00209     _histCol[kH1ResidualX]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ResidualsX"),1,
00210                                                            HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(_posHistPar[0]), _posHistPar[1], _posHistPar[2]),true);
00211     _histCol[kH1ResidualY]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ResidualsY"),1,
00212                                                            HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(_posHistPar[0]), _posHistPar[1], _posHistPar[2]),true);
00213 
00214     histogramList->create2DHistograms(_histGroupKey,_histHitPosKey, 1,  
00215                                       HistPar(static_cast<unsigned int>(_indexHistPar[0]),_indexHistPar[1],_indexHistPar[2]),
00216                                       HistPar(static_cast<unsigned int>(_indexHistPar[3]),_indexHistPar[4],_indexHistPar[5]),
00217                                       true);
00218     // verify code sanity: Are all the histograms created?
00219     assert(kNH1==11);
00220 #endif
00221 
00222   }
00223 
00224   void MipSelect::processEvent( LCEvent * evtP ) {
00225     if (evtP) {
00226       try {
00227         LCCollection* col_hits = evtP->getCollection( _colName ) ;
00228         //      _isolatedHits.clear();
00229 
00230 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00231         histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00232         histmgr::Histogram2DCollection_t & hit_map_h2=histogramList->getHistogram2DCollection(_histGroupKey,_histHitPosKey);
00233 #endif
00234 
00235         std::vector<Box> cluster;
00236 
00237         // --- first step group nearby hits
00238         for(UInt_t element_i=0; element_i < (UInt_t) col_hits->getNumberOfElements(); element_i++) {
00239           EVENT::CalorimeterHit *a_hit=dynamic_cast<EVENT::CalorimeterHit *>(col_hits->getElementAt(element_i));
00240 
00241 #ifdef CAN_CAST_CALORIMETERHIT_GETPOSITION      
00242           const ThreeVector_t *pointP=reinterpret_cast<const ThreeVector_t *>(a_hit->getPosition());
00243 #else
00244           ThreeVector_t temp;
00245           temp.set(a_hit->getPosition());
00246           const ThreeVector_t *pointP=&temp;
00247 #endif
00248         
00249           Double_t min_distance=FLT_MAX;
00250           UInt_t min_cluster_index=cluster.size();
00251           UInt_t cluster_index=0;
00252           for(std::vector<Box>::const_iterator cluster_iter=cluster.begin(); cluster_iter!=cluster.end(); cluster_iter++, cluster_index++) {
00253             if (cluster_iter->closerToEnvelopThan(_maxDist,pointP)) {
00254               Double_t a_min_distance=cluster_iter->minDistanceToPoints(pointP);
00255               if (a_min_distance<_maxDist) {
00256                 if (a_min_distance<min_distance) {
00257                   min_cluster_index=cluster_index;
00258                 }
00259               }
00260             }
00261           }
00262 
00263           if (min_cluster_index<cluster.size()) {
00264             cluster[min_cluster_index].add(a_hit);
00265           }
00266           else {
00267             cluster.push_back(Box());
00268             cluster.back().add(a_hit);
00269           }
00270 
00271         }
00272 
00273         // --- second step merge nearby groups 
00274         std::vector<Box> merged_cluster;
00275         for(std::vector<Box>::iterator cluster_iter=cluster.begin(); cluster_iter!=cluster.end(); cluster_iter++) {
00276           std::vector<Box>::iterator iter=cluster_iter;
00277           iter++;
00278           for(; iter!=cluster.end(); iter++) {
00279             if (iter->closerToEnvelopThan(_maxDist,*cluster_iter)) {
00280               iter->add(*cluster_iter);
00281               cluster_iter->setMerged();
00282               break;
00283             }
00284           }
00285         }
00286 
00287         // --- third step split clusters
00288         // TODO:
00289 
00290         //      std::cout << evtP->getEventNumber() << std::endl;
00291         //      std::cout << "n_clusters=" << cluster.size() << std::endl;
00292         //      for(std::vector<Box>::iterator cluster_iter=cluster.begin(); cluster_iter!=cluster.end(); cluster_iter++) {
00293         //        cluster_iter->show();
00294         //      }
00295       
00296         //      _isolatedHits.clear();
00297         
00298         // --- final step: create Cluster collection
00299         EVENT::LCCollection* col_cluster=new IMPL::LCCollectionVec( EVENT::LCIO::CLUSTER );
00300         for(std::vector<Box>::const_iterator cluster_iter=cluster.begin(); cluster_iter!=cluster.end(); cluster_iter++) {
00301           if (!cluster_iter->isMerged()) {
00302 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00303             dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1NHits]->getElementAt(0))->fill(cluster_iter->_hits.size());
00304 #endif
00305             if (   cluster_iter->_hits.size() >= static_cast<UInt_t>(_nHits[0]) 
00306                 && cluster_iter->_hits.size() <  static_cast<UInt_t>(_nHits[1]) ) {
00307               IMPL::ClusterImpl *a_cluster=new IMPL::ClusterImpl;
00308               Double_t sum[3]={0.,0.,0.};
00309               Double_t sum2[3]={0.,0.,0.};
00310               Double_t sum_of_weights=0.;
00311               Double_t total_energy=0.;
00312               UInt_t   n_weights=0;
00313 
00314               LinearRegression linreg[2];
00315 
00316               for (std::vector<const EVENT::CalorimeterHit *>::const_iterator hit_iter=cluster_iter->_hits.begin();
00317                    hit_iter != cluster_iter->_hits.end();
00318                    hit_iter++) {
00319                 if ((*hit_iter)->getEnergy()>0.) {
00320                   total_energy+=(*hit_iter)->getEnergy();
00321                 }
00322               }
00323 
00324               for (std::vector<const EVENT::CalorimeterHit *>::const_iterator hit_iter=cluster_iter->_hits.begin();
00325                    hit_iter != cluster_iter->_hits.end();
00326                    hit_iter++) {
00327 
00328                 if ((*hit_iter)->getEnergy()>0.) {
00329                   Double_t energy=(*hit_iter)->getEnergy();
00330                   Double_t weight=_w0+std::log(energy/total_energy);
00331                   if (weight>0) {
00332                     for (UInt_t coord_i=0; coord_i<3; coord_i++) {
00333                       sum[coord_i]+=(*hit_iter)->getPosition()[coord_i] * weight;
00334                       sum2[coord_i]+= sqr((*hit_iter)->getPosition()[coord_i]) * weight;
00335                     }
00336                     linreg[0].add((*hit_iter)->getPosition()[2],(*hit_iter)->getPosition()[0],weight);
00337                     linreg[1].add((*hit_iter)->getPosition()[2],(*hit_iter)->getPosition()[1],weight);
00338                     sum_of_weights+=weight;
00339                     n_weights++;
00340                   }
00341                 }
00342 
00343                 a_cluster->addHit(const_cast<EVENT::CalorimeterHit *>(*hit_iter),1.);
00344               }
00345 
00346               if (   n_weights >= static_cast<UInt_t>(_nHits[0]) 
00347                   && n_weights <  static_cast<UInt_t>(_nHits[1]) ) {
00348 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00349                 dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1ClusterSignal]->getElementAt(0))->fill(total_energy);
00350                 std::vector<Double_t> energy_per_layer;
00351                 energy_per_layer.resize(_lastLayer+1);
00352                 std::fill(energy_per_layer.begin(),energy_per_layer.end(),0.);
00353 #endif
00354                 
00355                 if (total_energy >= _clusterEnergy[0] && total_energy < _clusterEnergy[1]) {
00356                   Float_t pos[3];
00357                   EVENT::FloatVec pos_err;
00358                   pos_err.resize(6,0.);
00359                   linreg[0].calc();
00360                   linreg[1].calc();
00361                   
00362                   Double_t chi2=0;
00363                   Double_t sum_of_weights=0;
00364                   UInt_t   n_weights=0;
00365                   for (std::vector<const EVENT::CalorimeterHit *>::const_iterator hit_iter=cluster_iter->_hits.begin();
00366                        hit_iter != cluster_iter->_hits.end();
00367                        hit_iter++) {
00368                     
00369                     Double_t energy=(*hit_iter)->getEnergy();
00370                     Double_t weight=_w0+std::log(energy/total_energy);
00371                     
00372                     if (energy>0 && weight>0) {
00373                       Double_t res_x=(*hit_iter)->getPosition()[0]-linreg[0].eval((*hit_iter)->getPosition()[2]);
00374                       Double_t res_y=(*hit_iter)->getPosition()[1]-linreg[1].eval((*hit_iter)->getPosition()[2]);
00375 
00376 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00377                       CALICE::CellIndex cell_index((*hit_iter)->getCellID0());
00378                       UInt_t layer_index=cell_index.getLayerIndex();
00379                       UInt_t cell_x=(cell_index.getWaferColumn())*6+(cell_index.getPadColumn()-1);
00380                       UInt_t cell_y=(cell_index.getWaferRow()-1)*6+(cell_index.getPadRow()-1);
00381                       if (layer_index>static_cast<UInt_t>(_histCol[kH1ClusterSignal]->getNumberOfElements())) {
00382 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00383                         assert( _histCol[kH1ClusterSignal]->getNumberOfElements()>0 );
00384 #endif
00385                         layer_index = _histCol[kH1ClusterSignal]->getNumberOfElements()-1;
00386                       }
00387 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00388                       assert( layer_index <= _lastLayer && layer_index>0);
00389 #endif
00390                       dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1HitX]->getElementAt(layer_index))->fill(cell_x, weight);
00391                       dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1HitY]->getElementAt(layer_index))->fill(cell_y, weight);
00392                       hit_map_h2.histogram(0)->fill(cell_x,cell_y,weight);
00393 
00394                     energy_per_layer[layer_index]+=(*hit_iter)->getEnergy();
00395                     dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1ResidualX]->getElementAt(layer_index))->fill(res_x);
00396                     dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1ResidualY]->getElementAt(layer_index))->fill(res_y);
00397 #endif
00398                       chi2+=sqr(res_x/weight);
00399                       chi2+=sqr(res_y/weight);
00400                       sum_of_weights+=weight;
00401                       n_weights++;
00402                     }
00403                   }
00404                   
00405                   if (n_weights>0) {
00406                     chi2 /= (sum_of_weights-sum_of_weights*2/n_weights);
00407 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00408                     dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1Chi2]->getElementAt(0))->fill(chi2);
00409                     dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1Angle]->getElementAt(0))->fill(atan(linreg[0].ascent())*180/M_PI);
00410                     dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1Angle]->getElementAt(1))->fill(atan(linreg[1].ascent())*180/M_PI);
00411                     for (UInt_t layer_i=0; layer_i<=_lastLayer; layer_i++) {
00412                       dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1SignalVsLayer]->getElementAt(0))->fill(layer_i,energy_per_layer[layer_i]);
00413                     }
00414 #endif
00415                   }
00416                   
00417                   if (sum_of_weights>0. && chi2<_maxChi2) {
00418                     
00419 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00420                     dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1NHits]->getElementAt(0))->fill(n_weights);
00421 #endif
00422                     for (UInt_t coord_i=0; coord_i<3; coord_i++) {
00423                       Double_t mean=sum[coord_i]/sum_of_weights;
00424                       sum2[coord_i]=sqrt((sum2[coord_i]-mean*sum[coord_i])/(sum_of_weights));
00425                       pos[coord_i]=mean;
00426 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00427 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00428                       assert(_histCol[kH1Mean]->getNumberOfElements()==3);
00429 #endif              
00430                       dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1Mean]->getElementAt(coord_i))->fill(mean);
00431                       dynamic_cast<histmgr::FloatHistogram1D*>(_histCol[kH1RMS]->getElementAt(coord_i))->fill(sum2[coord_i]);
00432 #endif
00433                     }
00434                     
00435                     pos_err[1]=pos_err[2]=pos_err[4]=0.;
00436                     //          pos_err[0]=sum2[0];
00437                     //          pos_err[3]=sum2[1];
00438                     //          pos_err[5]=sum2[2];
00439                     pos_err[0]=_posError[0];
00440                     pos_err[3]=_posError[1];
00441                     pos_err[5]=_posError[2];
00442                     a_cluster->setPosition(pos);
00443                     a_cluster->setPositionError(pos_err);
00444                     a_cluster->setEnergy(total_energy);
00445                     
00446                     // TODO: calculate cluster thrust axis.
00447                     
00448                     col_cluster->addElement(a_cluster);
00449                     continue;
00450                   }
00451                 }
00452               }
00453               delete a_cluster;
00454             }
00455           }
00456         }
00457         evtP->addCollection(col_cluster, _clusterColName);
00458         
00459       }
00460       catch (lcio::DataNotAvailableException err) {
00461       }
00462     }
00463   }
00464 
00465 #ifdef WITH_CONTROL_HISTOGRAMS
00466   void MipSelect::moduleLocationChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00467     UInt_t last_layer=0;
00468     for (UInt_t elm_i=0; elm_i<static_cast<UInt_t>(col->getNumberOfElements()); elm_i++) {
00469       CALICE::ModuleLocation location(col->getElementAt(elm_i));
00470       CALICE::CellIndex cell_index(location.getCellIndexOffset());
00471       if (cell_index.getLayerIndex()>last_layer) {
00472         last_layer=cell_index.getLayerIndex();
00473       }
00474     }
00475     _lastLayer=last_layer;
00476     
00477     // recreate per layer histograms:
00478     histmgr::HistMgr *histogramList=histmgr::HistMgr::getInstance();
00479 
00480     _histCol[kH1ResidualX]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ResidualsX"),last_layer+1,
00481                                                            HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(_posHistPar[0]), _posHistPar[1], _posHistPar[2]),true);
00482     _histCol[kH1ResidualY]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ResidualsY"),last_layer+1,
00483                                                            HistPar(static_cast<UInt_t>(_posHistPar[0]), _posHistPar[1], _posHistPar[2]),true);
00484     _histCol[kH1SignalVsLayer]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterTotalSignalPerLayer"),1,
00485                                                                HistPar(last_layer+1, -.5, last_layer+.5),true);
00486     _histCol[kH1HitX]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterHitX"),last_layer+1,
00487                                                       HistPar(18,-.5,18-.5),true);
00488     _histCol[kH1HitY]=histogramList->createHistograms(_histGroupKey,histmgr::Key_t("ClusterHitY"),last_layer+1,
00489                                                       HistPar(18,-.5,18-.5),true);
00490 
00491   }
00492 #endif
00493 
00494   void MipSelect::end() {
00495   }
